subtitle: Serve as a tasty brunch or speedy weekday meal.

method.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Fry the onion, garlic and chilli for 3 min until softened. Add the bacon and pepper. Cook for 3-5 min.
Add the tomatoes, baked beans and seasoning. Simmer together for 10-15 min until thickened slightly.
Warm the tortillas according to pack instructions.

Divide the filling between tortillas. Roll up to incorporate the mixture. Arrange in an ovenproof dish. Sprinkle with the cheees. Grill under a preheated medium grill for 3-5 min until cheese is melted and golden.
Drizzle over the creme fraiche to serve.

title: Mexican style tortillas with bacon
